name: burglarx
story:
Burglar X  Unico Electronics Co., Ltd.  1997

Burglar X is an arcade beat-'em up with puzzle elements. The player can move with 8-way joystick and control 3 buttons - one to hit, another to fart (toxic gas from your ass) and another to launch timed bombs. 

The objective of the game is to destroy enemies, collect objects & power-ups, solve puzzles and defeat the final bosses. We lose a life when we lose one of the three hearts with which we begin.

We can choose a male (Gukjung)character who strikes with his head and a female (Guksoon) who strikes with a mallet.

The are 5 stages with 5 rounds. The distribution of stages is:

- Round 1 to 3: Destroy and collect Stars or Coins. To get ahead in these rounds you must get a certain number of coins or stars.

- Round 4: Escape Enemy - you have to run to the exit.

- Between phase 4 and 5 there is a puzzle to discover similar items in a limited time.

- Round 5: Final Boss. Destroy with bombs.
